channel.title: Posts on Patrick Jusic
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Patrick Jusic

item.title: Hello Friend
item.description: I built this website because I missed one. I used Hugo as you can see from footer, and I used this amazing theme by panr. I kept the image of the first post because it was amazing inside the theme. This theme is a good representation of myself, I use this style in my text editors, my OS.. but I’m not like Mr. Robot, though I love the character. I don’t think I’m going to make a series of blog posts, maybe in the future.
